com.connectlife.coreserver.console

Interface ShellCmd

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShellCmdExit, ShellCmdHelp, ShellCmdOutputAllConfig, ShellCmdOutputConfig, ShellCmdOutputEnv, ShellCmdOutputLog, ShellCmdQuit, ShellCmdRegisterAccessory, ShellCmdRestoreFactoryConfig, ShellCmdSetConfig, ShellCmdShutdown, ShellCmdUnregisterAccessory, ShellCmdVersion

    public interface ShellCmd
    Interface of all command in shell.
    Author:
    ericpinet
    2016-02-07

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkLineForCommandCompatibility(String _line)
      Check if the line is compatible with this command.
      String execute(String _line)
      Execute the command with this shell line.
      String getCommand()
      Get the command format.
      String getHelp()

    • Method Detail

      • getCommand

        String getCommand()
        Get the command format. Ex: exit.
        Returns:
        Return a string with the command.

      • getHelp

        String getHelp()
        Return the help string of the command.
        Returns:
        Help string.

      • checkLineForCommandCompatibility

        boolean checkLineForCommandCompatibility(String _line)
        Check if the line is compatible with this command.
        Parameters:
        _line - Line enter by the user.
        Returns:
        True if the line in compatible with this command.

      • execute

        String execute(String _line)
        throws InterruptedIOException
        Execute the command with this shell line.
        Parameters:
        _line - The shell line enter by the user.
        Returns:
        The shell string return to display at the user.
        Throws:
        InterruptedIOException - The execution can cause a inturruption of the console screen. (Exit/Quit/Shutdown)
